ai-patthana3.12:8.1_0: Gladness doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities. Desire a basis for defilement. Unskillfulness due to lack of doubt and uncertainty. Delusion gives rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana3.12:9.1_0: Once we’re not skilled in teaching, skilled in loss, and a bad place, the defilements don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana3.12:10.1_0: Unskillfulness arises in someone who isn’t skilled in defilement, robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick. And he doesn’t overcome their doubts or uncertainties in doubt.

ai-patthana3.12:11.1_0: Neithers don’t put a new pair of robes in the nine orifices. They’re not produced in nine orifices, butter from the nine projects.

ai-patthana3.12:63.1_0: A skillful quality gives rise to defilements. Someone whose defilements are shaking off the defilements. Corrupted by the defilements. Someone whose mind is also a cause of defilements.
ai-patthana3.12:64.1_0: unconcerned by defilements, giving up defilements, and corruption. It is a cause or condition for the corruption of defilements.
